metadata.title: CVE-2018-19777 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0, there is an infinite loop in the functionsvg_dev_end_tile in fitz/svg-device.c, as demonstrated by mutool.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19777` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.15.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.15.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.0+ds1-1').
